metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15575 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3, Redmine.pm lacks a checkfor whether the Repository module is enabled in a project's settings, whichmight allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive differences information orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
